name: Escape Corona En La Playa
description:
THIS IS THE BEACH VERSION, ADDED MORE DIFFICULTY, IF YOU REACH 100 ILL SEND A PIZZA TO YOUR HOUSE

The Mexican government has created a superhero campaign against  COVID19 called Susana Distancia.

Susana has the ability  to summon a barrier to avoid being infected by evil viruses

I have made this game to support the case and have fun at same time. 

Controls:

KEYBOARD ARROWS
